participant_1.background:
I have a deep appreciation for the color green because it reminds me of the lush forests surrounding my cabin.
I go for a walk in the park to clear my head and to enjoy the sunshine.
I often snack too much on sweets, even though I know it's not good for my health.
I'm so good at football, my friends would be shocked to know that I hate sweet potatoes.
i ve been rejected several times and thought of giving up with this.

i talk very fast.

I'm not sure if I'll be able to balance my work and my personal life.

content.text: I work at a puzzle company and I just got promoted to CEO.
That's awesome! I bet your family is really proud of you.
They are, thanks! I'm really happy with how things are going.
That's great to hear. What do you enjoy most about your job?
I love working on puzzles and coming up with new ideas. I also like the challenge of figuring out how to make our puzzles more difficult and engaging.
That sounds like a really fun job. I'm not very good at puzzles, but I still enjoy them.
You should give it another try! You might surprise yourself.
I might just do that. Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem. What do you do for work?
I'm a football player. I've been playing since I was a kid and I love it.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a football player, but I'm not very athletic.
You don't have to be very athletic to play football. It's more about heart and determination.
I guess I could give it a try. I'm not sure if I'll be any good, but it would be fun to try.
You should! You might just surprise yourself.
